tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ImageMasks (
    mask_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT,
    mask_data BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE Images (
    image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_name VARCHAR,
    image_data BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE Categories (
    category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    category_name VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE ImageCategoryMapping (
    mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT,
    category_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE ImageMetadata (
    metadata_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
)
